job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
     * Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
     * ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   What We Offer:
     * Cutting-edge Tech Work: Engage with technologies like AWS in both new and legacy codebases.
     * AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.
     * Global Engineering Community: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts., * Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
     * Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
     * ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   What We Offer:
     * Cutting-edge Tech Work: Engage with technologies like AWS in both new and legacy codebases.
     * AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.
     * Global Engineering Community: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts., * Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and integrate AI-driven solutions into existing products, rather than focusing on the core development, fine-tuning, or deployment of generative models themselves. While it mentions 'generative AI journey' and 'AI-driven innovations', the core responsibilities lean towards leveraging AI tools for software engineering tasks like coding, error detection, and feature development, which aligns with the definition of the 'Ambiguous' profile for roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'AI-First Software Engineer', 'craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions', 'developing innovative features', 'scalable, serverless applications', 'robust, cloud-native applications', 'Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions', and 'Enhance product functionality'. These all point to traditional software development activities.
The phrase 'leverage AI tools to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions' indicates using AI as a tool within the software development process.
job_tasks.phrase: leverage AI tools to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights integrating AI into product lines and developing features, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines

job_tasks.justification: Developing scalable and serverless applications is a core software development task.
Building innovative features is a key aspect of software engineering.
Leveraging cloud-native technologies is part of modern software development practices.
job_tasks.phrase: leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies

job_tasks.justification: Developing and deploying back-end solutions using serverless technologies is a direct software development responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies

job_tasks.justification: Creating robust, cloud-native applications is a software development objective.
Conducting code reviews and ensuring best practices are standard software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards

job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI-driven solutions into cloud services is a software development task focused on product enhancement.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.' using AI tools directly relates to enhancing software development processes.
job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.

job_tasks.justification: Modernizing product lines through AI-driven innovations is a software development goal focused on improving existing products.

job_tasks.phrase: enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement

job_tasks.justification: Understanding the specific product lines (Jive, Influitive, ACRM) and their goals is part of business understanding.

job_tasks.justification: Understanding the goals of the Influitive platform, such as empowering brand advocates and fostering community, is business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.

job_tasks.justification: Understanding the ACRM solution and its objectives (sales, marketing, support integration, customer view) is business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

job_tasks.phrase: AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.

soft_skills.justification: The job description mentions 'Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts' and 'collaborate with a global team'.
soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.

soft_skills.justification: The mention of 'global engineering community' implies collaboration across different locations and cultures.
The phrase 'innovative solutions' and 'innovative features' suggests a need for innovation.

The description implies a need to work with both new and legacy codebases, suggesting adaptability.

soft_skills.justification: The description mentions 'offering actionable insights' which requires pragmatic application of data and AI.
The focus on improving efficiency in coding, error detection, and bug fixing suggests a pragmatic approach to development.
soft_skills.phrase: improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.

technologies.justification: AWS is explicitly mentioned as a technology to engage with.
The phrase 'serverless technologies' refers to cloud-based serverless computing services.
The phrase 'cloud-native applications' indicates a reliance on cloud platform services.
The term 'generative AI journey' directly refers to generative models.
